title: 19 - Dan St. Germain
itunes:title: 19 - Dan St. Germain
description: You know him from Conan, Fallon, HBO, Comedy Central, and way too many other credits to list that you probably don’t care about. But, at the very least, you should care about this hilarious man talking on this whirlwind of an episode. We’re talking about everything from the rise (and fall) of various social media platforms to how to make libraries popular again to having warrants out for arrest in foreign countries. Here’s five words to describe this episode: white light is surrounding you.
